# BÃ i táº­p: Táº¡o Dockerfile Full-stack

## Má»¥c tiÃªu
Dockerize á»©ng dá»¥ng React + Node.js full-stack

## Dockerfile React
```dockerfile
# frontend/Dockerfile
FROM node:20-alpine AS builder
WORKDIR /app
COPY package*.json ./
RUN npm ci
COPY . .
RUN npm run build

FROM nginx:alpine
COPY --from=builder /app/build /usr/share/nginx/html
COPY nginx.conf /etc/nginx/conf.d/default.conf
EXPOSE 80
CMD ["nginx", "-g", "daemon off;"]
```

## Dockerfile API Node.js
```dockerfile
# backend/Dockerfile
FROM node:20-alpine
WORKDIR /app
COPY package*.json ./
RUN npm ci --omit=dev && \
    apk add --no-cache curl

COPY . .

RUN addgroup -g 1001 -S nodejs && \
    adduser -S api -u 1001 && \
    chown -R api:nodejs /app

USER api
EXPOSE 3000

HEALTHCHECK --interval=30s --timeout=3s \
  CMD curl -f http://localhost:3000/health || exit 1

CMD ["npm", "start"]
```

## nginx.conf
```nginx
server {
    listen 80;
    location / {
        root /usr/share/nginx/html;
        try_files $uri /index.html;
    }
    location /api/ {
        proxy_pass http://backend:3000/;
    }
}
```

## Kiá»ƒm tra
```bash
# Build Frontend
cd frontend
docker build -t my-frontend .

# Build Backend
cd backend
docker build -t my-backend .

# Khá»Ÿi Ä‘á»™ng
docker run -d --name api my-backend
docker run -d --name web -p 80:80 my-frontend
```

# Tá»‘i Æ°u Hiá»‡u suáº¥t Docker

## 1. Tá»‘i Æ°u I/O trÃªn WSL2

æ¼”ç¿’ï¼šMERN Stack with Compose.content:
# BÃ i táº­p: MERN Stack vá»›i Compose

## Má»¥c tiÃªu
XÃ¢y dá»±ng MongoDB + Express + React + Node.js vá»›i Docker Compose

## compose.yml
```yaml
name: mern-stack

networks:
  frontend:
  backend:

services:
  # React Frontend
  client:
    build:
      context: ./client
      dockerfile: Dockerfile
    ports:
      - "3000:3000"
    environment:
      - REACT_APP_API_URL=http://localhost:5000
    networks:
      - frontend
    depends_on:
      - api
    volumes:
      - ./client:/app
      - /app/node_modules

  # Express API
  api:
    build: ./server
    ports:
      - "5000:5000"
    environment:
      - MONGO_URI=mongodb://mongo:27017/merndb
      - NODE_ENV=development
    networks:
      - frontend
      - backend
    depends_on:
      mongo:
        condition: service_healthy
    volumes:
      - ./server:/app
      - /app/node_modules

  # MongoDB
  mongo:
    image: mongo:7
    ports:
      - "27017:27017"
    environment:
      - MONGO_INITDB_DATABASE=merndb
    volumes:
      - mongo_data:/data/db
    networks:
      - backend
    healthcheck:
      test: echo 'db.runCommand("ping").ok' | mongosh localhost:27017/test --quiet
      interval: 10s
      timeout: 5s
      retries: 5

  # Mongo Express (tÃ¹y chá»n)
  mongo-express:
    image: mongo-express
    ports:
      - "8081:8081"
    environment:
      - ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_URL=mongodb://mongo:27017/
    networks:
      - backend
    depends_on:
      - mongo
    profiles:
      - tools

volumes:
  mongo_data:
```

```bash
# Dá»«ng vÃ  xÃ³a

# XÃ³a bao gá»“m volumes

```

# BÃ i táº­p: Cuá»™c thi Tá»‘i Æ°u KÃ­ch thÆ°á»›c Image

## Má»¥c tiÃªu
So sÃ¡nh cÃ¡c phÆ°Æ¡ng phÃ¡p khÃ¡c nhau vá»›i cÃ¹ng á»©ng dá»¥ng vÃ  táº¡o image nhá» nháº¥t

## Baseline (KhÃ´ng Tá»‘i Æ°u)
```dockerfile

CMD ["npm", "start"]
```
KÃ­ch thÆ°á»›c: ~1.1GB

## Má»©c Tá»‘i Æ°u 1: Sá»­ dá»¥ng Alpine

## Má»©c Tá»‘i Æ°u 2: Multi-stage
```dockerfile

WORKDIR /app
COPY package*.json ./
RUN npm ci
COPY . .
RUN npm run build && npm prune --production

FROM node:20-alpine
WORKDIR /app
COPY --from=builder /app/dist ./dist
COPY --from=builder /app/node_modules ./node_modules
COPY package*.json ./
```

KÃ­ch thÆ°á»›c: ~120MB (-89%)

## Má»©c Tá»‘i Æ°u 3: Distroless
```dockerfile

WORKDIR /app
COPY package*.json ./
RUN npm ci
COPY . .
RUN npm run build

FROM gcr.io/distroless/nodejs20-debian11
WORKDIR /app
COPY --from=builder /app/dist ./dist
COPY --from=builder /app/node_modules ./node_modules
CMD ["dist/server.js"]
```
KÃ­ch thÆ°á»›c: ~80MB (-93%)

#!/bin/bash
# security-scan.sh - Script quÃ©t báº£o máº­t cho CI/CD

set -e

IMAGE_NAME=${1:-"myapp:latest"}
THRESHOLD=${2:-"HIGH"}

echo "ğŸ” Security Scanning: $IMAGE_NAME"
echo "ğŸ“Š Threshold: $THRESHOLD"

# 1. QuÃ©t image vá»›i Trivy
echo "\n=== Trivy Scan ==="
trivy image --severity $THRESHOLD,CRITICAL \
  --exit-code 1 \
  --format table \
  $IMAGE_NAME

# 2. PhÃ¢n tÃ­ch tÄ©nh dockerfile vá»›i Hadolint
echo "\n=== Hadolint Check ==="
hadolint Dockerfile || true

# 3. Kiá»ƒm tra best practices vá»›i Dockle
echo "\n=== Dockle Check ==="
docker run --rm \
  -v /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock \
  goodwithtech/dockle:latest \
  --exit-code 1 \
  --exit-level warn \
  $IMAGE_NAME

# 4. Táº¡o SBOM
echo "\n=== Generating SBOM ==="
syft $IMAGE_NAME -o json > sbom.json

# 5. BÃ¡o cÃ¡o káº¿t quáº£
echo "\nâœ… Security scan completed!"
echo "ğŸ“‹ SBOM saved to: sbom.json"

æ¼”ç¿’ï¼šã‚»ã‚­ãƒ¥ã‚¢ãªãƒ—ãƒ­ãƒ€ã‚¯ã‚·ãƒ.content:
# BÃ i táº­p: Cáº¥u hÃ¬nh Production Báº£o máº­t

## Má»¥c tiÃªu
Táº¡o image vá»›i táº¥t cáº£ best practices báº£o máº­t Ä‘Æ°á»£c Ã¡p dá»¥ng

## Dockerfile Báº£o máº­t
```dockerfile
# ============================================
# Multi-stage Build: Security Hardened
# ============================================

# Giai Ä‘oáº¡n 1: Builder
FROM node:20-alpine AS builder

# Cáº­p nháº­t báº£o máº­t
RUN apk update && apk upgrade && \
    apk add --no-cache dumb-init

WORKDIR /build

# Chá»‰ sao chÃ©p dependencies trÆ°á»›c (táº­n dá»¥ng cache)
COPY package*.json ./
RUN npm ci --omit=dev && npm cache clean --force

# Sao chÃ©p mÃ£ nguá»“n vÃ  build
COPY . .
RUN npm run build && \
    npm prune --production

# Giai Ä‘oáº¡n 2: Runtime (Distroless)
FROM gcr.io/distroless/nodejs20-debian11:nonroot

# Metadata
LABEL maintainer="your@email.com"
LABEL version="1.0.0"
LABEL description="Secure production image"

WORKDIR /app

# Chá»‰ sao chÃ©p tá»‡p cáº§n thiáº¿t
COPY --from=builder --chown=nonroot:nonroot /build/dist ./dist
COPY --from=builder --chown=nonroot:nonroot /build/node_modules ./node_modules
COPY --from=builder --chown=nonroot:nonroot /build/package*.json ./
COPY --from=builder /usr/bin/dumb-init /usr/bin/

# NgÆ°á»i dÃ¹ng non-root (máº·c Ä‘á»‹nh distroless)
USER nonroot

# Healthcheck
HEALTHCHECK --interval=30s --timeout=3s --start-period=10s --retries=3 \
  CMD ["node", "-e", "require('http').get('http://localhost:3000/health', (r) => process.exit(r.statusCode === 200 ? 0 : 1))"]

# Sá»­ dá»¥ng dumb-init (giáº£i phÃ¡p váº¥n Ä‘á» PID 1)
ENTRYPOINT ["/usr/bin/dumb-init", "--"]
CMD ["node", "dist/server.js"]
```

## Cáº¥u hÃ¬nh Compose Báº£o máº­t
```yaml
services:
  api:
    build: .
    read_only: true  # Read-only filesystem
    tmpfs:
      - /tmp
    cap_drop:
      - ALL
    cap_add:
      - NET_BIND_SERVICE
    security_opt:
      - no-new-privileges:true
    deploy:
      resources:
        limits:
          cpus: '1.0'
          memory: 512M
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "node", "healthcheck.js"]
      interval: 30s
```

## Checklist Báº£o máº­t
- [ ] NgÆ°á»i dÃ¹ng non-root
- [ ] Base Distroless/Alpine
- [ ] Read-only filesystem
- [ ] Háº¡n cháº¿ Capability
- [ ] Giá»›i háº¡n tÃ i nguyÃªn
- [ ] Trivy scan CRITICAL=0
- [ ] Healthcheck triá»ƒn khai
- [ ] Quáº£n lÃ½ Secrets
- [ ] Giao tiáº¿p TLS

GitHub Actions CI/CD.content:
# .github/workflows/docker.yml
name: Docker CI/CD

on:
  push:
    branches: [main]
  pull_request:
    branches: [main]

jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - uses: docker/setup-buildx-action@v3

      - uses: docker/login-action@v3
        with:
          registry: ghcr.io
          username: ${{ github.actor }}
          password: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}

      - uses: docker/build-push-action@v6
        with:
          context: .
          push: true
          tags: ghcr.io/${{ github.repository }}:latest
          cache-from: type=gha
          cache-to: type=gha,mode=max

      - name: Run Trivy scan
        run: |
          docker run --rm \
            -v /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock \
            aquasec/trivy:latest \
            image ghcr.io/${{ github.repository }}:latest

# compose.yml (Production)
services:
  frontend:
    build:
      context: ./frontend
      dockerfile: Dockerfile.prod
    ports:
      - "80:80"
    depends_on:
      - backend
    restart: unless-stopped

    healthcheck:

      interval: 30s
      timeout: 3s
      retries: 3

  postgres:
    image: postgres:13-alpine
    environment:
      - POSTGRES_DB=ecommerce
      - POSTGRES_USER=user
      - POSTGRES_PASSWORD=password
    volumes:
      - pg_data:/var/lib/postgresql/data
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD-SHELL", "pg_isready -U user"]
      interval: 10s
      timeout: 5s
      retries: 5
    restart: unless-stopped

  redis:
    image: redis:7-alpine
    volumes:
      - redis_data:/data
    restart: unless-stopped

volumes:
  pg_data:
  redis_data:
